title: Tourist places in Mangaldoi, Assam
content: Mangaldai also spelled Mangaldoi is a town in the Indian state of Assam. It was named after Mangaldahi, who was the daughter of the Rajah of Darrang and was married to Susenghphaa (r. 1603–1641), (also Pratap Singha), a ruler of the Ahom kingdom. title: Top Places to visit in Darrang, Mangaldoi, Assam
content:
Darrang is an administrative district in the state of Assam in India. The district headquarters are located at Mangaldoi. The district occupies an area of 1585 km2.
 
History
